topic.title: Cand P Exam Event - conformance rules

ol.li: Contains exactly one [1..1] dateCompleted with data type Point In Time

Contains exactly one [1..1] examDate with data type Point In Time
The date and time of the examination for the patient.

Contains exactly one [1..1] examType with data type Code
Contains the code that identifies the type of examination performed for the patient.

Contains exactly one [1..1] id with data type Code
Unique identifier for the is Examination occrurence.

Contains exactly one [1..1] results with data type String
The consequence of a particular action, operation, or course; an outcome.

Contains exactly one [1..1] status with data type Code
The status of the examination for the patient.
Contains zero or one [0..1] clinicalDocument, where its type is Clinical Document Event
Contains exactly one [1..1] examiningPhysician, where its type is Individual Provider
Contains zero or one [0..1] insufficientReason, where its type is Insufficient Reason
Contains zero or one [0..1] examLocation, where its type is Institution
Contains exactly one [1..1] dateCompleted with data type Point In Time

Contains exactly one [1..1] examDate with data type Point In Time
The date and time of the examination for the patient.

Contains exactly one [1..1] examType with data type Code
Contains the code that identifies the type of examination performed for the patient.

Contains exactly one [1..1] id with data type Code
Unique identifier for the is Examination occrurence.

Contains exactly one [1..1] results with data type String
The consequence of a particular action, operation, or course; an outcome.

Contains exactly one [1..1] status with data type Code
The status of the examination for the patient.
Contains zero or one [0..1] clinicalDocument, where its type is Clinical Document Event
Contains exactly one [1..1] examiningPhysician, where its type is Individual Provider
Contains zero or one [0..1] insufficientReason, where its type is Insufficient Reason
Contains zero or one [0..1] examLocation, where its type is Institution
